name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Silverwing: Beyond
summary:
Version 5.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the "Thus Spoke Apocalypse" arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Silverwing: N-EX
• New Open World: A Post Honkai Odyssey Chapter 2
• New Story Chapter XXVIII: Beyond Will
• New Animated Short: Thus Spoke Apocalypse
• ...and more!
